data.caption: Board recommends Dividend
data.news_body: Southern Petrochemicals Industries Corporation Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on May 08 2025 have recommended a Dividend on Equity of Rs. 2/- per equity share of Rs. 10/- each (20% ) for the Financial Year 2024-25 subject to the approval of the Shareholders at the ensuing 54th Annual General Meeting (AGM). data.caption: Resignation of Director
data.news_body:
Southern Petrochemicals Industries Corporation Ltd has informed BSE that:

We have received letter dated 5th August 2020 from Tamilnadu Industrial Development Corporation Limited, enclosing the resignation letter of K. Balasubramaniam, IAS (DIN: 07991792) their Nominee Director on the Board of SPIC. As per Section 168 of the Companies Act, 2013 the resignation shall take effect from 6th August 2020 being the date of receipt of resignation letter by the Company.

data.caption: Intimation under Regulation 30(6) of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 - Re-appointment of Director
data.news_body: Southern Petrochemicals Industries Corporation Ltd has informed BSE regarding Intimation under Regulation 30(6) of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 - Re-appointment of Director.

2. Consolidated Financial Results for the period ended March 31, 2020

3. Standalone Auditors Report for the period ended March 31, 2020

6. Consolidated Cash Flow Statement for the period ended March 31, 2020

data.caption: Resumption of Production
data.news_body:
Southern Petrochemicals Industries Corporation Ltd has informed BSE that the Company’s Plants at Tuticorin have been restarted and production of Urea and Ammonia resumed at 7 AM today (i.e. April 22, 2020).

As informed earlier, the Plants were shut-down from February 21, 2020 after having achieved the Annual Production quota for 2019-20 as per the norms of the Ministry of Fertilisers. During this period certain jobs to improve the performance efficiency and necessary maintenance work were undertaken and completed.

data.caption: Intimation of delay in Restart after Plant Shut Down
data.news_body: Southern Petrochemicals Industries Corporation Ltd has informed BSE regarding Intimation of delay in Restart after Plant Shut Down.

data.caption: Change in Directorate
data.news_body: Southern Petrochemicals Industries Corporation Ltd has informed BSE about the Change in the Directors of the Company.

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Southern Petrochemicals Industries Corporation Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at their Meeting held on March 25, 2020 recorded the vacation of office of Mr. B. Elangovan, Nominee Director of Tamilnadu Industrial Development Corporation Ltd., as Director of the Company with effect from February 29, 2020, under Section 167(1)(b) of the Companies Act, 2013.

data.caption: Resignation of Director
data.news_body: Southern Petrochemicals Industries Corporation Ltd has informed BSE that the Company have on February 26, 2020 received a letter dated February 25, 2020 from Tamilnadu Industrial Development Corporation Limited, enclosing the resignation letter of Dr. Aneesh Sekhar. S, IAS their Nominee Director on the Board of SPIC. As per Section 168 of the Companies Act, 2013 the resignation shall take effect from February 26, 2020 being the date of receipt of resignation letter by the Company.

2. Consolidated Financial Results for the period ended December 31, 2019

3. Standalone Limited Review for the period ended December 31, 2019

4. Consolidated Limited Review for the period ended December 31, 2019

5. Result Press Release for the period ended December 31, 2019

data.caption: Intimation of Plant Shut Down
data.news_body: Southern Petrochemicals Industries Corporation Ltd has informed BSE regarding Intimation of Plant Shut Down.

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
Southern Petrochemicals Industries Corporation Ltd has informed BSE that the term of office of Mr. Sumanjit Chaudhry appointed as Independent Director of the Company for a term of 5 years from February 10, 2015 with the approval of the shareholders ended at the close of office hours on February 09, 2020.

The Board of Directors at their Meeting held on February 18, 2020 recorded the cessation of office by Mr. Sumanjit Chaudhry at the end of his tenure and decided to induct another person as Independent Director, in the vacancy caused as required under the Companies Act, 2013 and SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.
